teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Supporters of Kyrgyzstan -Mol Bulak Finance
teams.loan_because: to learn, to help and to connect.
teams.description:
In the very heart of Central Asia lies a wonderful mountainous land – a country of Kyrgyzstan with the rich history that dates back to 201 BC. More than 80 ethnic groups live here, creating the variety of cultures and traditions. It serves as a trade crossroad and a trans-shipment point between the Europe and Asia as before when it used to be a connecting-link between north and south directions of Silk Way. 

The economy of Kyrgyzstan was severely affected by the collapse of the Soviet trading block. More than 20% of the Kyrgyz population has left to other parts of the Soviet Union within past 10 years to seek work.

While strong growth in neighboring Kazakhstan and China has created opportunities for expansion, Kyrgyzstan remains a small economy vulnerable to external shocks. Persistently high inflation, coupled with the global financial crisis, threatens to undermine recent improvements in poverty levels.

teams.name: OGs That Give a Phuck
teams.loan_because: We give a phuck.
teams.description: I don't like rules and I was going to join a pretty cool popular Team when I thought, they don't quite represent me, exactly. I like where their head is at but it just didn't fit an OG like me. I love Old School NWA and Ice-T. I can appreciate the genius of R. Kelly and I believe that climate change is old news. It's happening now. I love a good nature show and I'll slap the taste outta your mouth. I believe in hard work and opportunity. So long as you're not hurting anybody or yourself, I'm not gonna knock your hustle. That's a nod to The Porn Industry in case you're wondering. I believe that if you don't help someone, not talk about helping them, achieve their dreams you don't get to achieve yours.

teams.name: Team Global Private Funding
teams.loan_because:
A small loan goes a long ways!

In most cases, it's harder to find a lender for $100.00 than finding a lender who will lend a $1,000,000.00. It almost always is that person who is looking to borrow a $100.00 that needs it the most. It's a matter of survival to a family. We do what we do so that others may prosper.

"How many lives have you touched today?" Sam Francis Senev, Chairman & CEO

Global Private Funding, ‘a perfect marriage between dollars and good sense’
teams.description: Lenders who seek to expand their reach globally without consideration for boundaries that are physical, social and racial. Just because it feels good! We are those who are hand on and not just lending from the comforts of our homes and offices. Join us and make a difference.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Fatmoon Studios
teams.loan_because: We're left of centre, free-range, creative types who want to support others to earn an income to do the same.
teams.description: A motley assortment of artists, film-makers, writers, creative thinkers who want to change the world or at least the wallpaper.

teams.name: Team Bee Folks
teams.loan_because: The Bee Folks started as a hobby with a $400 microloan.  We have grown such that we now sell somewhere around 20,000 pounds of honey a year, plus our own line of beauty products.  All this started because one person believed in us....
teams.description: The Bee Folks is a family-oriented beekeeping business, specializing in single floral source honeys.  Our customers span the globe.  We hope Team Bee Folks will present a community for our customers and staff to provide opportunities to other enterprising families.

teams.name: Endangered Beekeepers
teams.loan_because: "We ought to do good to others as simply as a horse runs, or a bee makes honey, or a vine bears grapes season after season without thinking of the grapes it has borne."  -Marcus Aurelius
teams.description: We support honeybees, their keepers, and all who toil season after season to do good for the human hive.   Our team photo is of Carmen, a Peruvian beekeeper and Kiva loan recipient.

teams.name: Microforesty - Plant Trees to Fight Poverty!
teams.loan_because: There is a link between poverty and environmental degradation.  To fight poverty, we must find sustainable solutions.
teams.description: We are supporters of Komaza and microforesty!! Plant trees to fight poverty and deforestation in coastal Kenya!

teams.name: Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All
teams.loan_because: 2.6 billion people, or 40% of the world, lack access to basic sanitation. The resulting disease causes nearly 2 million deaths, 10% of the global disease burden, and $84 billion in worker productivity loss each year. The high population density combined with the lack of infrastructure and resources makes the problem particularly acute in slums, where populations will double to 2 billion by 2030. Kenya is at the epicenter of this crisis with 10 million people living in slums, 80% of whom lack access to basic sanitation.
teams.description:
Members of Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All enjoy seeing Sanergy's Fresh Life Operators receive loans for, and operate their Fresh Life Toilet businesses in Kenya.

Sanergy promotes the fundamental human right to sanitation in the slums of Kenya by increasing access to and usage of hygienic sanitation facilities. Sanergy creates an efficient, equitable, and sustainable sanitation cycle by building a dense network of small-scale sanitation centers across the slums, a low-cost containerized waste collection infrastructure, and converting this waste at a central processing facility into electricity, fertilizer, and other high-margin products.

Sanergy is an official Kiva field partner.

teams.name: Friends of Juhudi Kilimo
teams.loan_because: Juhudi is changing the way farmers do business.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Team Vekkuli Vatkuli
teams.loan_because: It's both useful and fun.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Munich
teams.loan_because: Munich likes to share its prosperity

teams.name: Investment Club @ CHS
teams.loan_because: The world can be changed for the better when good people don't just stand by and let things happen but rather do something about it.

teams.name: Thunderbird, School of Global Management
teams.loan_because: We are a truly global community of business leaders dedicated to improving sustainable economic growth worldwide.
teams.description: Students, staff, profesors & alumni of Thunderbird, School of Global Management (#1 in International Business).

teams.name: Finland
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Finland

teams.name: Friendly Planet Travel
teams.loan_because: We would like the opportunity to give back to the different countries and locations where we send travelers.
teams.description: A team of caring travelers that would like to continue making a difference around the world.

teams.name: The iShare Project
teams.loan_because: There are millions of people around the world that are jobless and are suffering. Especially in developing countries where these individuals are forced to live in ways that most Californians could never imagine.  Many don't have access to the proper education, housing or even food!  So we're changing that situation and assisting entrepreneurs with the necessary funds and knowledge in order to get their business off the ground!
teams.description: We are a generous and entrepreneurial community that work and live in California.  We're on a mission to raise $10K in four months through Kiva.

teams.name: Dermalogica Canada

We want to help put more women on the road to financial indepdendence through entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!

teams.loan_because: We have been touched by the hand of God to touch the life of others

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Pittsburgh
teams.loan_because: Pittsburghers understand hard work. We support the idea of opportunity for all people.
teams.description:
The Kiva Pittsburgh team is made up of progressive Pittsburgh natives, transplants and others who love the city. We look forward to hosting events for current Kiva loaners and those interested in Kiva.

We come together to make a change in our world.

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/KivaPittsburgh

Check us out on Facebook:
www.facebook.com/KivaPittsburgh

teams.name: Armenia
teams.loan_because: we want to be part of a global community that aims to sustainably alleviate poverty
teams.description:
The Armenia Team currently has 90 members supporting Armenian entrepreneurs. 

Whether they make cheese, herd sheep, sell shoes, or grow tomatoes, our team exists to support them in getting access to affordable loans all over Armenia.
 
Past and Present Kiva Fellows Serving in Armenia:

- Velizara Passajova KF8
- Brian Kelly KF9
- Suzanne Till KF9
- Alexis Ohanian KF10
- Liz Nagle KF10
- Peter Tashjian KF11
- Vanick Der Bedrossian KF12
- Abhishek Banerjee KF13
- Caree Edson KF14

As Kiva Fellows, we are here to support Kiva lending in Armenia. We will update team members with interesting news, and gladly answer any questions you may have.

Happy lending, and Go Team Armenia!

You can check out our field partners:
SEF International here: http://www.kiva.org/partners/169
and Nor Horizon here:
http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=146&_tpg=fb

teams.name: My Electronics Mart
teams.loan_because:
We like to help out with anything to help people get on there feet. 
And to make this world a better place. If everybody would just give a little it would help so much. God blesses all of us.
teams.description:
We are very hard working people, that try to give the best deals to where we dont make a lot. Just enough to pay some bill. We only mark our product from factory price 10% up and that is it. We want everybody to be able to get somethings they have wanted, but could not get it cause it is to muck. We dont mark are stuff up 50% or more like everyone else does. We want to help. So we do as much as we can. The My Electronics Mart team. 
Wisdom is knowing what to do next; virtue is doing it." You are obviously both wise and virtuous. Please accept our sincere thanks for this chance to help with money for these special people. You won't be forgotten. They did so much for so little. How do you find the words to express your thanks? For what they do.

teams.name: Kiva Walk
teams.loan_because: Because we know the benefit of someone providing a 'hand up' both in our work and throughout our life.
teams.description: Founded by a 8.5 month walk across the USA in 2010, the KivaWalk Lending Team is a growing movement of Kiva champions that use walking to teach and instill Kiva's mission while also connecting us to the profound benefits of life at 3mph.

So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.loan_because: We can!  We believe that the grass-roots efforts of micro-lending can make a big difference by providing working capital quickly to those in dire need of it. Our lending on Kiva fulfill the hopes of so many hard working people who strive to improve their life style.

teams.description: We are dedicated brewery workers and supporters who wish to help others acheive their career dreams as we have ours!

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.
